Fleur & Bee So Clean! Cleanser

Brand: Fleur & Bee

Category: Facial Cleanser

Ingredients: WATER, ORGANIC COCONUT OIL, ORGANIC SUNFLOWER OIL, GLYCERIN (KOSHER, VEGETABLE), ORGANIC CASTOR OIL, ORGANIC ALOE VERA LEAF EXTRACT, GUAR GUM, CARRAGEENAN, ORGANIC GOTU KOLA, CITRIC ACID, L-ARGININE, HORSETAIL EXTRACT, ACRYLATES/C10-30 ALKYL ACRYLATE CROSSPO

KYL ACRYLATE CROSSPOLYMER, DANDELION EXTRACT, PHENOXYETHANOL, ETHYLHEXYLGLYCERIN, WILD GERANIUM EXTRACT, ROSEMARY LEAF EXTRACT

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer
